sentences.sContent: He tolerated the presence of an amateur, idler and dilettante and proved a perfect teacher and matchless travel companion.
sentences.sContent_eng: He tolerated the presence of an amateur, idler and dilettante and proved a perfect teacher and matchless travel companion.
sentences.sCn: 他能够容忍我这个业余爱好者的浅薄与无知，当之无愧是一个好老师和一个无与伦比的好伙伴。

sentences.sContent: It is also a phenomenological layers which encourage dilettante contemplation.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is also a phenomenological layers which encourage dilettante contemplation.
sentences.sCn: 这也是一个鼓励业余爱好者深思的现象层。

synos.tran: 业余爱好者；一知半解者
浅薄的；业余艺术爱好的

words.tran: 对艺术、科学等一知半解的；半瓶醋似的；浅薄的；业余爱好的

trans.tranCn: 业余爱好者；一知半解者
浅薄的；业余艺术爱好的
（在艺术、科学等方面）浅尝辄止
